subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: After 11 practices, a preseason game and dozens of miles logged on a stationary bike, Giants defensive end Osi Umenyiora planned to participate in practice for the first time in training camp Monday.
snippet: After 11 practices, a preseason game and dozens of miles logged on a stationary bike, Giants defensive end Osi Umenyiora planned to participate in practice for the first time in training camp Monday.
